entities.name: veritasers u m
entities.description: The location where the events took place, mentioned as '673' and later described as a castle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being helped by Mad-Eye Moody to walk back to the castle.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: A wizard who is helping Harry walk back to the castle and asking him questions about what happened.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A person who was killed by Voldemort in a graveyard, mentioned by Harry as having been taken there with him on a Portkey.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as 'Lord Voldemort', who killed Cedric and is trying to get his body back.

entities.name: durmstrang ship
entities.description: A ship that is located near the lake on the lawn, mentioned as being seen by Harry while he was being helped by Mad-Eye Moody.

relationships.description: Mad-Eye Moody is helping Harry walk back to the castle, as described in the text: 'the man helping him walk'.
Harry and Cedric were taken to a graveyard on a Portkey, as described in the text: 'Cup was a Portkey... Took me and Cedric to a graveyard'.
Voldemort killed Cedric in the graveyard, as described by Harry: 'Killed Cedric... they killed Cedric'.
Harry dueled with Voldemort, as described in the text: 'And then we dueled... You dueled with the Dark Lord?'
